Class PlotRadar

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.chartjs.plot.PlotOptions
        • org.fujion.chartjs.plot.PlotRadar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOptionMapTransform, IClientTransform

    public class PlotRadar
extends PlotOptions
    Options for radar plots.

      • lineTension

        @Option
public Double lineTension
        Bezier curve tension of the line. Set to 0 to draw straightlines. This option is ignored if monotone cubic interpolation is used.
